name: Pong: 32
description:
Pong: 32 is an in-development modified and modernized version of Pong. It is in development and has Paddle Customization, Powerups, and more! It has such powerups as:

Mushroom: Distorts screen in multiple ways when ball hits it.

Scale: Lowers Player Scale, increases AI Scale.

Darkened Ball: When hit, the ball becomes dark and you should avoid the ball!

Invert: Inverts your screen upside down and reverses your controls when hit.

Current Version: Pong: 32 v0.5
